entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Slowed the Spread and saved Lives? He calls 120,000 lives lost a success! Trump admitted last night that he purposely slowed down the testing. This is no Joke! Trump spoke  for 10 mins. yesterday on how to drink from a glass & 30 seconds on Coronavirus. Shameful & Murderous!!! https://t.co/QYDkTgTV1g
